mapper.sql: id, equipment_name, equipment_interface, equipment_material, equipment_inner_address, equipment_physical_address, equipment_inner_value, equipment_isonline, equipment_factoryinfo, equipment_remark, equipment_record_time, equipment_operator
mapper.insert:
insert into equipment (equipment_name, equipment_interface, equipment_material, equipment_inner_address, equipment_physical_address, equipment_inner_value, equipment_isonline, equipment_factoryinfo, equipment_remark, equipment_record_time, equipment_operator) values
(#{item.equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentInnerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentPhysicalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentInnerValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentIsonline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.equipmentFactoryinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.equipmentRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.equipmentOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER})
